When I was at a camp with my mom, I met a single mom with two kids, a girl and boy, the sis was 2 years older, and I was a year older than her. They had a sort of incestous game, which the sis had taught him. She lay down on the bunker bed with her legs spread and the brother pulled his pants down and mounted on her from the top. They made me do it too but was too shy and backed away after a sec. I stayed over for that night and she came over to the other side where I was sleeping and french kissed me like how MJ french kissed spiderman. We switched doing this throughout the night, so I went over and kissed her and she went over and kissed me. It was the best experience ever, that I remember so vividly like it was yesterday.
